name: Confused Librarian
description:
Confused Librarian

A small student game jam game about putting books back where they belong, whilst also trying not to be a disappointment. 

Search for books around the library, and try to throw them into their correct bookshelves. The book category names are scrambled, and there's really not much time!

Programming: Deon Chique
3D Models & Environment: Sam Vidler
Interfaces: Markus Volkmann
Posters & Book Covers: Raelene Nicado
With Music by Rilla Bray
